author: Vince Gervais
comment: Hands and features are off center.  Contacted them,  but no response.   Try one of the other faces.

author: Jeffrey T
comment: Like the watch face however the minute and hour hands are off center making the face look strange and unusable. Do not download.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've send an email to you.
Thank you.

title: Not displayed properly on moto 360

author: Chris Benavidez
comment: Watch face is alright but the hour/minute hands are not centered.  Can't use it like that.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please send us your situation in detail.
The capture image would be help.
Please feel free to contact our email address.We can give you a help.
Thank you.

title: Not worth purchasing yet

author: perry farmer
comment: Error downloading, finally made it. Would like a different set of hands. Hands need to be calibrated as 24 hour dial doesn't line up, others a 'little' off as well and appear not to move until midnight. A nice overall look that needs to be polished.
title: Ok

author: Rodney Baitwa
comment: Very nice watch face but could you please give an option to not use the black and white watch face. Its annoying when it shows up and then quickly switches to the main watch face. Otherwise I love it so much.
title: Great!!

author: Dave Spina
comment: Extreme lag and looks very low res. Moto 360.
title: Sucks

author: James Hernandez
comment: Nice but came up short on quality. It looks cheap.

author: Sullys Reviews
comment: I have found some apps do not work well, this one seems to do the job, activates like it should with a twist of the wrist.
title: So far so good

author: Fangming Gu
comment: The indicator for the current month is little off: it should be right on Aug (8) or Sep (9). There is NO 8.9 month.  The indicator for the current day of the week is little off (for Monday, it is little over).  The hour indicator in the 24-hour sub-dial is off too. At 9:55am, the indicator is already past the 10.
title: Graphics still need some work

author: Blake Bowden
comment: One of the best watch faces for the moto 360!
title: Awesome!

author: Matthew Whitcher
comment: Man, this watch face is great.
title: Awesome!
